topics.name: Allah (God)
topics.description: Verses about Allah's attributes, names, and divine nature.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
ayahs.translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

ayahs.text: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
ayahs.translation: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

ayahs.text: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ
ayahs.translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.

ayahs.text: لَا إِكْرَاهَ فِي الدِّينِ ۖ قَد تَّبَيَّنَ الرُّشْدُ مِنَ الْغَيِّ
ayahs.translation: There is no compulsion in religion. The right course has become clear from the wrong.

ayahs.text: اللَّهُ وَلِيُّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يُخْرِجُهُم مِّنَ الظُّلُمَاتِ إِلَى النُّورِ
ayahs.translation: Allah is the ally of those who believe. He brings them out from darknesses into the light.

ayahs.text: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
ayahs.translation: Say, He is Allah, [who is] One.

ayahs.text: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
ayahs.translation: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

ayahs.text: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
ayahs.translation: He neither begets nor is born.

ayahs.text: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
ayahs.translation: Nor is there to Him any equivalent.

ayahs.text: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ
ayahs.translation: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed.

ayahs.text: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ
ayahs.translation: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection.

ayahs.text: هُوَ اللَّهُ الْخَالِقُ الْبَارِئُ الْمُصَوِّرُ
ayahs.translation: He is Allah, the Creator, the Inventor, the Fashioner.

ayahs.text: ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ ۖ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
ayahs.translation: That is Allah, your Lord; there is no deity except Him.

ayahs.text: لَا تُدْرِكُهُ الْأَبْصَارُ وَهُوَ يُدْرِكُ الْأَبْصَارَ
ayahs.translation: Vision perceives Him not, but He perceives [all] vision.

ayahs.text: إِنَّنِي أَنَا اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنَا فَاعْبُدْنِي
ayahs.translation: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me.

ayahs.text: فَتَعَالَى اللَّهُ الْمَلِكُ الْحَقُّ ۖ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
ayahs.translation: So exalted is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth; there is no deity except Him.

ayahs.text: وَهُوَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ لَهُ الْحَمْدُ فِي الْأُولَىٰ وَالْآخِرَةِ
ayahs.translation: And He is Allah; there is no deity except Him. To Him is [due all] praise in the first [life] and the Hereafter.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ
ayahs.translation: O mankind, remember the favor of Allah upon you.

topics.name: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)
topics.description: Verses about Prophet Muhammad, his character, and mission.

ayahs.text: لَّقَدْ كَانَ لَكُمْ فِي رَسُولِ اللَّهِ أُسْوَةٌ حَسَنَةٌ
ayahs.translation: There has certainly been for you in the Messenger of Allah an excellent pattern.

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayahs.translation: And indeed, you are of a great moral character.

ayahs.text: وَمَا مُحَمَّدٌ إِلَّا رَسُولٌ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِهِ الرُّسُلُ
ayahs.translation: Muhammad is not but a messenger. [Other] messengers have passed on before him.

ayahs.text: مَّا كَانَ مُحَمَّدٌ أَبَا أَحَدٍ مِّن رِّجَالِكُمْ وَلَٰكِن رَّسُولَ اللَّهِ وَخَاتَمَ النَّبِيِّينَ
ayahs.translation: Muhammad is not the father of [any] one of your men, but [he is] the Messenger of Allah and last of the prophets.

ayahs.text: قُل سُبْحَانَ رَبِّي هَلْ كُنتُ إِلَّا بَشَرًا رَّسُولًا
ayahs.translation: Say, 'Exalted is my Lord! Was I ever but a human messenger?'

ayahs.text: رَبَّنَا وَابْعَثْ فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ يَتْلُو عَلَيْهِمْ آيَاتِكَ
ayahs.translation: Our Lord, and send among them a messenger from themselves who will recite to them Your verses.

ayahs.text: الَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ الرَّسُولَ النَّبِيَّ الْأُمِّيَّ
ayahs.translation: Those who follow the Messenger, the unlettered prophet.

ayahs.text: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَآمَنُوا بِمَا نُزِّلَ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ
ayahs.translation: And those who believe and do righteous deeds and believe in what has been revealed to Muhammad.

ayahs.text: مُّحَمَّدٌ رَّسُولُ اللَّهِ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ أَشِدَّاءُ عَلَى الْكُفَّارِ
ayahs.translation: Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah; and those with him are forceful against the disbelievers.

ayahs.text: وَمُبَشِّرًا بِرَسُولٍ يَأْتِي مِن بَعْدِي اسْمُهُ أَحْمَدُ
ayahs.translation: And bringing good tidings of a messenger to come after me, whose name is Ahmad.

topics.name: Previous Prophets & Messengers
topics.description: Stories and lessons from earlier prophets including Adam, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Jesus, and others.

ayahs.text: يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ
ayahs.translation: O Children of Israel, remember My favor which I have bestowed upon you.

ayahs.text: وَإِذِ ابْتَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ رَبُّهُ بِكَلِمَاتٍ فَأَتَمَّهُنَّ
ayahs.translation: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham was tried by his Lord with commands and he fulfilled them.

ayahs.text: لَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ
ayahs.translation: We had certainly sent Noah to his people.

ayahs.text: لَقَدْ كَانَ فِي قَصَصِهِمْ عِبْرَةٌ لِّأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
ayahs.translation: There was certainly in their stories a lesson for those of understanding.

ayahs.text: قَالَ إِنِّي عَبْدُ اللَّهِ آتَانِيَ الْكِتَابَ وَجَعَلَنِي نَبِيًّا
ayahs.translation: [Jesus] said, 'Indeed, I am the servant of Allah. He has given me the Scripture and made me a prophet.'

ayahs.text: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا نُوحِي إِلَيْهِ أَنَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنَا
ayahs.translation: And We sent not before you any messenger except that We revealed to him that, 'There is no deity except Me.'

topics.name: Prayer & Worship (Salah & Ibadah)
topics.description: Comprehensive verses about prayer, worship, and devotion to Allah.

ayahs.text: إِيَّاكَ نَعْبُدُ وَإِيَّاكَ نَسْتَعِينُ
ayahs.translation: It is You we worship and You we ask for help.

ayahs.text: الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ
ayahs.translation: Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them.

ayahs.text: وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَارْكَعُوا مَعَ الرَّاكِعِينَ
ayahs.translation: And establish prayer and give zakah and bow with those who bow.

ayahs.text: حَافِظُوا عَلَى الصَّلَوَاتِ وَالصَّلَاةِ الْوُسْطَىٰ
ayahs.translation: Maintain with care the [obligatory] prayers and [in particular] the middle prayer.

ayahs.text: فَإِذَا قَضَيْتُمُ الصَّلَاةَ فَاذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ قِيَامًا وَقُعُودًا
ayahs.translation: And when you have completed the prayer, remember Allah standing, sitting, and [lying] on your sides.

ayahs.text: أَقِمِ الصَّلَاةَ لِدُلُوكِ الشَّمْسِ إِلَىٰ غَسَقِ اللَّيْلِ
ayahs.translation: Establish prayer at the decline of the sun [from its meridian] until the darkness of the night.

ayahs.text: إِنَّنِي أَنَا اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنَا فَاعْبُدْنِي وَأَقِمِ الصَّلَاةَ لِذِكْرِي
ayahs.translation: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ الصَّلَاةَ تَنْهَىٰ عَنِ الْفَحْشَاءِ وَالْمُنكَرِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing.

ayahs.text: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
ayahs.translation: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

topics.name: Charity & Zakat
topics.description: All verses about charity, helping others, and spending in the way of Allah.

ayahs.text: وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ
ayahs.translation: And give zakah.

ayahs.text: وَآتَى الْمَالَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ ذَوِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينَ
ayahs.translation: And gives wealth, in spite of love for it, to relatives, orphans, the needy.

ayahs.text: يَسْأَلُونَكَ مَاذَا يُنفِقُونَ ۖ قُلْ مَا أَنفَقْتُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ فَلِلْوَالِدَيْنِ
ayahs.translation: They ask you what they should spend. Say, 'Whatever you spend of good is [to be] for parents and relatives.'

ayahs.text: مَّثَلُ الَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ حَبَّةٍ
ayahs.translation: The example of those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah is like a seed [of grain].

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنفِقُوا مِن طَيِّبَاتِ مَا كَسَبْتُمْ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, spend from the good things which you have earned.

ayahs.text: خُذْ مِنْ أَمْوَالِهِمْ صَدَقَةً تُطَهِّرُهُمْ وَتُزَكِّيهِم بِهَا
ayahs.translation: Take from their wealth a charity by which you purify them and cause them increase.

ayahs.text: وَفِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
ayahs.translation: And from their properties was [given] a right to the [needy] who asked and to the deprived.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ الْمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَالْمُصَّدِّقَاتِ وَأَقْرَضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the men who practice charity and the women who practice charity.

topics.name: Jannah (Paradise)
topics.description: Detailed descriptions of Paradise and rewards for the righteous.

ayahs.text: وَبَشِّرِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٍ
ayahs.translation: And give good tidings to those who believe and do righteous deeds that they will have gardens.

ayahs.text: قُلْ أَؤُنَبِّئُكُم بِخَيْرٍ مِّن ذَٰلِكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ اتَّقَوْا عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتٌ
ayahs.translation: Say, 'Shall I inform you of [something] better than that? For those who feared Allah will be gardens.'

ayahs.text: وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ
ayahs.translation: Allah has promised the believing men and believing women gardens beneath which rivers flow.

ayahs.text: أُولَٰئِكَ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهِمُ الْأَنْهَارُ
ayahs.translation: Those will have gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow.

ayahs.text: قُلْ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ أَمْ جَنَّةُ الْخُلْدِ الَّتِي وُعِدَ الْمُتَّقُونَ
ayahs.translation: Say, 'Is that better or the garden of eternity which is promised to the righteous?'

ayahs.text: إِنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ الْيَوْمَ فِي شُغُلٍ فَاكِهُونَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation.

ayahs.text: يَا عِبَادِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْكُمُ الْيَوْمَ وَلَا أَنتُمْ تَحْزَنُونَ
ayahs.translation: O My servants, no fear will there be concerning you this Day, nor will you grieve.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place.

ayahs.text: مَّثَلُ الْجَنَّةِ الَّتِي وُعِدَ الْمُتَّقُونَ ۖ فِيهَا أَنْهَارٌ
ayahs.translation: Is the description of Paradise, which the righteous are promised, wherein are rivers.

ayahs.text: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ جَنَّتَانِ
ayahs.translation: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens.

ayahs.text: وَجَزَاهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
ayahs.translation: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden and silk.

topics.name: Jahannam (Hell)
topics.description: Verses about Hell, punishment, and consequences of disbelief.

ayahs.text: فَإِن لَّمْ تَفْعَلُوا وَلَن تَفْعَلُوا فَاتَّقُوا النَّارَ
ayahs.translation: But if you do not - and you will never be able to - then fear the Fire.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا سَوْفَ نُصْلِيهِمْ نَارًا
ayahs.translation: Indeed, those who disbelieve in Our verses - We will drive them into a Fire.

ayahs.text: مِّن وَرَائِهِ جَهَنَّمُ وَيُسْقَىٰ مِن مَّاءٍ صَدِيدٍ
ayahs.translation: Before him is Hell, and he will be given a drink of purulent water.

ayahs.text: وَالَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا اصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ
ayahs.translation: And those who say, 'Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell.'

ayahs.text: إِذَا أُلْقُوا فِيهَا سَمِعُوا لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ
ayahs.translation: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
ayahs.translation: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait.

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
ayahs.translation: Then you will surely see Hellfire.

topics.name: Day of Judgment (Yawm al-Din)
topics.description: Comprehensive verses about the Last Day, resurrection, and final accountability.

ayahs.text: مَالِكِ يَوْمِ الدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: Sovereign of the Day of Recompense.

ayahs.text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
ayahs.translation: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast.

ayahs.text: لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
ayahs.translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection.

ayahs.text: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا
ayahs.translation: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing.

ayahs.text: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
ayahs.translation: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it.

ayahs.text: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
ayahs.translation: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

ayahs.text: الْقَارِعَةُ
ayahs.translation: The Striking Calamity.

ayahs.text: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
ayahs.translation: What is the Striking Calamity?

topics.name: Faith & Belief (Iman)
topics.description: Verses about belief, faith, and trust in Allah.

ayahs.text: ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ هُدًى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayahs.translation: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah.

ayahs.text: وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ
ayahs.translation: And who believe in what has been revealed to you and what was revealed before you.

ayahs.text: لَّيْسَ الْبِرَّ أَن تُوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ قِبَلَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَلَٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنْ آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ
ayahs.translation: Righteousness is not that you turn your faces toward the east or the west, but [true] righteousness is [in] one who believes in Allah.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا آمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, believe in Allah and His Messenger.

ayahs.text: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ اللَّهُ وَجِلَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ
ayahs.translation: The believers are only those who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts become fearful.

ayahs.text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ
ayahs.translation: Certainly will the believers have succeeded.

ayahs.text: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا
ayahs.translation: The believers are only the ones who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and then doubt not.

topics.name: Patience & Perseverance (Sabr)
topics.description: Verses about patience, perseverance, and trusting in Allah's plan.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer.

ayahs.text: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُم بِشَيْءٍ مِّنَ الْخَوْفِ وَالْجُوعِ وَنَقْصٍ مِّنَ الْأَمْوَالِ
ayahs.translation: And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth.

ayahs.text: الَّذِينَ إِذَا أَصَابَتْهُم مُّصِيبَةٌ قَالُوا إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ
ayahs.translation: Who, when disaster strikes them, say, 'Indeed we belong to Allah, and indeed to Him we will return.'

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اصْبِرُوا وَصَابِرُوا وَرَابِطُوا
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, persevere and endure and remain stationed.

ayahs.text: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ صَبَرُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ
ayahs.translation: Except for those who are patient and do righteous deeds.

ayahs.text: وَلَئِن صَبَرْتُمْ لَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لِّلصَّابِرِينَ
ayahs.translation: But if you are patient - it is better for those who are patient.

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلْنَا بَعْضَكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ فِتْنَةً أَتَصْبِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: And We have made some of you [people] as trial for others - will you have patience?

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
ayahs.translation: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience.

topics.name: Forgiveness & Allah's Mercy
topics.description: Verses about Allah's mercy, forgiveness, and repentance.

ayahs.text: الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
ayahs.translation: The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

ayahs.text: رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِن نَّسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا
ayahs.translation: Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we have forgotten or erred.

ayahs.text: وَالَّذِينَ إِذَا فَعَلُوا فَاحِشَةً أَوْ ظَلَمُوا أَنفُسَهُمْ ذَكَرُوا اللَّهَ فَاسْتَغْفَرُوا
ayahs.translation: And those who, when they commit an immorality or wrong themselves, remember Allah and seek forgiveness.

ayahs.text: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ سُوءًا أَوْ يَظْلِمْ نَفْسَهُ ثُمَّ يَسْتَغْفِرِ اللَّهَ يَجِدِ اللَّهَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
ayahs.translation: And whoever does a wrong but then seeks forgiveness of Allah will find Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

ayahs.text: كَتَبَ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ الرَّحْمَةَ
ayahs.translation: He has decreed upon Himself mercy.

ayahs.text: وَرَحْمَتِي وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ
ayahs.translation: But My mercy encompasses all things.

ayahs.text: وَأَنِ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوبُوا إِلَيْهِ
ayahs.translation: And [saying], 'Seek forgiveness of your Lord and repent to Him.'

ayahs.text: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ إِلَّا رَحْمَةً لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.

ayahs.text: وَتُوبُوا إِلَى اللَّهِ جَمِيعًا أَيُّهَ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ
ayahs.translation: And turn to Allah in repentance, all of you, O believers.

ayahs.text: إِلَّا من تَابَ وَآمَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًا صَالِحًا
ayahs.translation: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work.

ayahs.text: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ
ayahs.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have transgressed against themselves, do not despair of the mercy of Allah.'

ayahs.text: هَلْ جَزَاءُ الْإِحْسَانِ إِلَّا الْإِحْسَانُ
ayahs.translation: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?

topics.name: Knowledge & Wisdom (Ilm & Hikmah)
topics.description: Verses about seeking knowledge, wisdom, and understanding.

ayahs.text: اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
ayahs.translation: Read in the name of your Lord who created.

ayahs.text: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
ayahs.translation: Who taught by the pen.

ayahs.text: عَلَّمَ الْإِنسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
ayahs.translation: Taught man that which he knew not.

ayahs.text: وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
ayahs.translation: And say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge.'

ayahs.text: إِنَّمَا يَخْشَى اللَّهَ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ الْعُلَمَاءُ
ayahs.translation: Only those fear Allah, from among His servants, who have knowledge.

ayahs.text: قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِي الَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَالَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.translation: Say, 'Are those who know equal to those who do not know?'

ayahs.text: يَرْفَعِ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنكُمْ وَالَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْعِلْمَ دَرَجَاتٍ
ayahs.translation: Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees.

ayahs.text: وَمَا أُوتِيتُم مِّنَ الْعِلْمِ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
ayahs.translation: And mankind have not been given of knowledge except a little.

topics.name: Creation of Universe & Natural World
topics.description: Verses about the creation of heavens, earth, and all living beings.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ فِي خَلْقِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَاخْتِلَافِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and earth, and the alternation of the night and the day.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ فِي خَلْقِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَاخْتِلَافِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ لَآيَاتٍ لِّأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the night and the day are signs for those of understanding.

ayahs.text: هُوَ الَّذِي أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً ۖ لَّكُم مِّنْهُ شَرَابٌ
ayahs.translation: It is He who sends down rain from the sky; from it is drink.

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا إِلَى الطَّيْرِ مُسَخَّرَاتٍ فِي جَوِّ السَّمَاءِ
ayahs.translation: Do they not see the birds controlled in the atmosphere of the sky?

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنَ الْمَاءِ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ حَيٍّ
ayahs.translation: And We made from water every living thing.

ayahs.text: وَمِنْ آيَاتِهِ أَنْ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٍ ثُمَّ إِذَا أَنتُم بَشَرٌ تَنتَشِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: And of His signs is that He created you from dust; then, suddenly you were human beings dispersing.

ayahs.text: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْأَزْوَاجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنبِتُ الْأَرْضُ
ayahs.translation: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows.

ayahs.text: وَالسَّمَاءَ بَنَيْنَاهَا بِأَيْدٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
ayahs.translation: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.

ayahs.text: وَالْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ
ayahs.translation: And the earth - He laid it for the creatures.

topics.name: Family & Parents
topics.description: Verses about family relations, respect for parents, and family values.

ayahs.text: وَقَضَىٰ رَبُّكَ أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوا إِلَّا إِيَّاهُ وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا
ayahs.translation: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment.

ayahs.text: وَاخْفِضْ لَهُمَا جَنَاحَ الذُّلِّ مِنَ الرَّحْمَةِ وَقُل رَّبِّ ارْحَمْهُمَا
ayahs.translation: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy and say, 'My Lord, have mercy upon them.'

ayahs.text: وَوَصَّيْنَا الْإِنسَانَ بِوَالِدَيْهِ حَمَلَتْهُ أُمُّهُ وَهْنًا عَلَىٰ وَهْنٍ
ayahs.translation: And We have enjoined upon man [care] for his parents. His mother carried him, [increasing her] in weakness upon weakness.

ayahs.text: وَوَصَّيْنَا الْإِنسَانَ بِوَالِدَيْهِ إِحْسَانًا
ayahs.translation: And We have enjoined upon man, to his parents, good treatment.

ayahs.text: وَاعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَلَا تُشْرِكُوا بِهِ شَيْئًا ۖ وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا
ayahs.translation: Worship Allah and associate nothing with Him, and to parents do good.

ayahs.text: وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا ۖ وَلَا تَقْتُلُوا أَوْلَادَكُم مِّنْ إِمْلَاقٍ
ayahs.translation: And to parents do good and do not kill your children out of poverty.

topics.name: Marriage & Relationships
topics.description: Verses about marriage, relationships, and family life.

ayahs.text: وَمِنْ آيَاتِهِ أَنْ خَلَقَ لَكُم مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا لِّتَسْكُنُوا إِلَيْهَا
ayahs.translation: And of His signs is that He created for you from yourselves mates that you may find tranquillity in them.

ayahs.text: هُنَّ لِبَاسٌ لَّكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لِبَاسٌ لَّهُنَّ
ayahs.translation: They are clothing for you and you are clothing for them.

ayahs.text: وَعَاشِرُوهُنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ
ayahs.translation: And live with them in kindness.

ayahs.text: وَلَا تَنكِحُوا الْمُشْرِكَاتِ حَتَّىٰ يُؤْمِنَّ
ayahs.translation: And do not marry polytheistic women until they believe.

ayahs.text: وَأَنكِحُوا الْأَيَامَىٰ مِنكُمْ وَالصَّالِحِينَ مِنْ عِبَادِكُمْ
ayahs.translation: And marry the unmarried among you and the righteous among your male slaves and female slaves.

topics.name: Women & Mothers
topics.description: Verses about the status and rights of women in Islam.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمُ الَّذِي خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَاحِدَةٍ
ayahs.translation: O mankind, fear your Lord, who created you from one soul.

ayahs.text: وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتُ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَاءُ بَعْضٍ
ayahs.translation: The believing men and believing women are allies of one another.

ayahs.text: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَالِحًا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ
ayahs.translation: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ الْمُسْلِمِينَ وَالْمُسْلِمَاتِ وَالْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the Muslim men and Muslim women, the believing men and believing women.

topics.name: Justice & Fairness (Adl)
topics.description: Verses about justice, fairness, and standing for truth.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُونُوا قَوَّامِينَ بِالْقِسْطِ شُهَدَاءَ لِلَّهِ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, be persistently standing firm in justice, witnesses for Allah.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُونُوا قَوَّامِينَ لِلَّهِ شُهَدَاءَ بِالْقِسْطِ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, be persistently standing firm for Allah, witnesses in justice.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَأْمُرُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَالْإِحْسَانِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct.

ayahs.text: وَمِمَّنْ خَلَقْنَا أُمَّةٌ يَهْدُونَ بِالْحَقِّ وَبِهِ يَعْدِلُونَ
ayahs.translation: And among those We created is a community which guides by truth and thereby establishes justice.

ayahs.text: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَعْدِلَ بَيْنَكُمُ
ayahs.translation: And I have been commanded to do justice among you.

topics.name: Death & Afterlife
topics.description: Verses about death, the afterlife, and what comes after this world.

ayahs.text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ ذَائِقَةُ الْمَوْتِ
ayahs.translation: Every soul will taste death.

ayahs.text: الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْمَوْتَ وَالْحَيَاةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ
ayahs.translation: [He] who created death and life to test you.

ayahs.text: وَجَاءَتْ سَكْرَةُ الْمَوْتِ بِالْحَقِّ
ayahs.translation: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth.

ayahs.text: وَهُوَ الَّذِي يَتَوَفَّاكُم بِاللَّيْلِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا جَرَحْتُم بِالنَّهَارِ
ayahs.translation: And it is He who takes your souls by night and knows what you have committed by day.

ayahs.text: فَلَوْلَا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ الْحُلْقُومَ
ayahs.translation: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat.

topics.name: Angels & The Unseen (Malaika & Ghaib)
topics.description: Verses about angels, their roles, and the unseen world.

ayahs.text: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي جَاعِلٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ خَلِيفَةً
ayahs.translation: And [mention] when your Lord said to the angels, 'Indeed, I will make upon the earth a successive authority.'

ayahs.text: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ فَاطِرِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ جَاعِلِ الْمَلَائِكَةِ رُسُلًا
ayahs.translation: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, [who] made the angels messengers.

ayahs.text: يُسَبِّحُونَ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ لَا يَفْتُرُونَ
ayahs.translation: They exalt [Him] night and day [and] do not slacken.

ayahs.text: مَن كَانَ عَدُوًّا لِّلَّهِ وَمَلَائِكَتِهِ وَرُسُلِهِ وَجِبْرِيلَ وَمِيكَالَ
ayahs.translation: Whoever is an enemy to Allah and His angels and His messengers and Gabriel and Michael.

ayahs.text: عَلَيْهَا مَلَائِكَةٌ غِلَاظٌ شِدَادٌ لَّا يَعْصُونَ اللَّهَ مَا أَمَرَهُمْ
ayahs.translation: Over it are angels, harsh and severe; they do not disobey Allah in what He commands them.

topics.name: Holy Quran & Revelation
topics.description: Verses about the Quran itself, its guidance, and miraculous nature.

ayahs.text: شَهْرُ رَمَضَانَ الَّذِي أُنزِلَ فِيهِ الْقُرْآنُ هُدًى لِّلنَّاسِ
ayahs.translation: The month of Ramadhan [is that] in which was revealed the Qur'an, a guidance for the people.

ayahs.text: لَقَدْ كَانَ فِي قَصَصِهِمْ عِبْرَةٌ لِّأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ ۗ مَا كَانَ حَدِيثًا يُفْتَرَىٰ
ayahs.translation: There was certainly in their stories a lesson for those of understanding. Never was the Qur'an a narration invented.

ayahs.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا الذِّكْرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُ لَحَافِظُونَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا الْقُرْآنَ يَهْدِي لِلَّتِي هِيَ أَقْوَمُ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, this Qur'an guides to that which is most suitable.

ayahs.text: قُل لَّئِنِ اجْتَمَعَتِ الْإِنسُ وَالْجِنُّ عَلَىٰ أَن يَأْتُوا بِمِثْلِ هَٰذَا الْقُرْآنِ
ayahs.translation: Say, 'If mankind and the jinn gathered in order to produce the like of this Qur'an.'

ayahs.text: لَّا يَأْتِيهِ الْبَاطِلُ مِن بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَلَا مِنْ خَلْفِهِ
ayahs.translation: Falsehood cannot approach it from before it or from behind it.

ayahs.text: إِنَّهُ لَقُرْآنٌ كَرِيمٌ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an.

topics.name: Guidance & The Straight Path
topics.description: Verses about divine guidance and the straight path.

ayahs.text: اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
ayahs.translation: Guide us to the straight path.

ayahs.text: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
ayahs.translation: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked [Your] anger or of those who are astray.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ قَدْ جَاءَتْكُم مَّوْعِظَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَشِفَاءٌ لِّمَا فِي الصُّدُورِ وَهُدًى
ayahs.translation: O mankind, there has come to you instruction from your Lord and healing for what is in the breasts and guidance.

ayahs.text: هُدًى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: As guidance and good tidings for the believers.

topics.name: Remembrance of Allah (Dhikr)
topics.description: Verses about remembering Allah and the benefits of dhikr.

ayahs.text: أَلَا بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ تَطْمَئِنُّ الْقُلُوبُ
ayahs.translation: Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ ذِكْرًا كَثِيرًا
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, remember Allah with much remembrance.

ayahs.text: فَاذْكُرُونِي أَذْكُرْكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِي وَلَا تَكْفُرُونِ
ayahs.translation: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.

ayahs.text: وَاذْكُر رَّبَّكَ إِذَا نَسِيتَ
ayahs.translation: And remember your Lord when you forget.

ayahs.text: الَّذِينَ يَذْكُرُونَ اللَّهَ قِيَامًا وَقُعُودًا وَعَلَىٰ جُنُوبِهِمْ
ayahs.translation: Who remember Allah while standing or sitting or [lying] on their sides.

topics.name: Gratitude & Thankfulness (Shukr)
topics.description: Verses about being grateful to Allah for His blessings.

ayahs.text: وَإِذْ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكُمْ لَئِن شَكَرْتُمْ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمْ
ayahs.translation: And [remember] when your Lord proclaimed, 'If you are grateful, I will certainly give you more.'

ayahs.text: وَمَن يَشْكُرْ فَإِنَّمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِهِ
ayahs.translation: And whoever is grateful - he is grateful for [the benefit of] himself.

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ السَّمْعَ وَالْأَبْصَارَ وَالْأَفْئِدَةَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
ayahs.translation: And made for you hearing and vision and hearts that perhaps you would be grateful.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُلُوا مِن طَيِّبَاتِ مَا رَزَقْنَاكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِلَّهِ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, eat from the good things which We have provided for you and be grateful to Allah.

topics.name: Trust in Allah (Tawakkul)
topics.description: Verses about relying on Allah and trusting in His plan.

ayahs.text: فَإِذَا عَزَمْتَ فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ
ayahs.translation: But when you have decided, then rely upon Allah.

ayahs.text: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
ayahs.translation: And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him.

ayahs.text: وَإِن جَنَحُوا لِلسَّلْمِ فَاجْنَحْ لَهَا وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ
ayahs.translation: And if they incline to peace, then incline to it [also] and trust in Allah.

ayahs.text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا ۚ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ
ayahs.translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us; He is our protector.' And upon Allah let the believers rely.

topics.name: Fear of Allah & God-Consciousness (Taqwa)
topics.description: Verses about God-consciousness and fearing Allah.

ayahs.text: وَتَزَوَّدُوا فَإِنَّ خَيْرَ الزَّادِ التَّقْوَىٰ
ayahs.translation: And take provisions, but indeed, the best provision is fear of Allah.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ اللَّهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ حَقَّ تُقَاتِهِ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, fear Allah as He should be feared.

ayahs.text: وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُ مَخْرَجًا
ayahs.translation: And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out.

topics.name: Trials & Tests (Fitnah & Ibtila)
topics.description: Verses about life's trials and how they test our faith.

ayahs.text: أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَن تَدْخُلُوا الْجَنَّةَ وَلَمَّا يَأْتِكُم مَّثَلُ الَّذِينَ خَلَوْا مِن قَبْلِكُم
ayahs.translation: Or do you think that you will enter Paradise while such [trial] has not yet come to you as came to those who passed on before you?

ayahs.text: أَحَسِبَ النَّاسُ أَن يُتْرَكُوا أَن يَقُولُوا آمَنَّا وَهُمْ لَا يُفْتَنُونَ
ayahs.translation: Do the people think that they will be left to say, 'We believe' and they will not be tried?

ayahs.text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا مَا عَلَى الْأَرْضِ زِينَةً لَّهَا لِنَبْلُوَهُمْ أَيُّهُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا
ayahs.translation: Indeed, We have made that which is on the earth adornment for it that We may test them [as to] which of them is best in deed.

ayahs.text: إِنَّمَا أَمْوَالُكُمْ وَأَوْلَادُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ
ayahs.translation: Your wealth and your children are but a trial.

topics.name: Community & Brotherhood (Ummah)
topics.description: Verses about the Muslim community and brotherhood.

ayahs.text: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَاكُمْ أُمَّةً وَسَطًا لِّتَكُونُوا شُهَدَاءَ عَلَى النَّاسِ
ayahs.translation: And thus we have made you a just community that you will be witnesses over the people.

ayahs.text: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ
ayahs.translation: The believers are but brothers, so make settlement between your brothers.

ayahs.text: وَاعْتَصِمُوا بِحَبْلِ اللَّهِ جَمِيعًا وَلَا تَفَرَّقُوا
ayahs.translation: And hold firmly to the rope of Allah all together and do not become divided.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَاحِدَةً وَأَنَا رَبُّكُمْ فَاعْبُدُونِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.

topics.name: Hardship & Divine Relief
topics.description: Verses about Allah's help during difficult times.

ayahs.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
ayahs.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
ayahs.translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

ayahs.text: وَعَسَىٰ أَن تَكْرَهُوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ ۖ وَعَسَىٰ أَن تُحِبُّوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ شَرٌّ لَّكُمْ
ayahs.translation: But perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you; and perhaps you love a thing and it is bad for you.

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌ ۖ أُجِيبُ دَعْوَةَ الدَّاعِ إِذَا دَعَانِ
ayahs.translation: And when My servants ask you concerning Me - indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me.

topics.name: Wealth & Poverty
topics.description: Verses about wealth, its proper use, and care for the poor.

ayahs.text: الَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُم بِاللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ سِرًّا وَعَلَانِيَةً
ayahs.translation: Those who spend their wealth [in Allah's way] by night and by day, secretly and publicly.

ayahs.text: الْمَالُ وَالْبَنُونَ زِينَةُ الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا
ayahs.translation: Wealth and children are [but] adornment of the worldly life.

ayahs.text: وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّمَا أَمْوَالُكُمْ وَأَوْلَادُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ
ayahs.translation: And know that your properties and your children are but a trial.

ayahs.text: وَفِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
ayahs.translation: And from their properties was [given] a right to the [needy] who asked and to the deprived.

ayahs.text: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
ayahs.translation: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.

topics.name: Hypocrisy & Hypocrites (Munafiqin)
topics.description: Verses about hypocrites and the dangers of hypocrisy.

ayahs.text: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ آمَنَّا بِاللَّهِ وَبِالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: And of the people are some who say, 'We believe in Allah and the Last Day,' but they are not believers.

ayahs.text: يُخَادِعُونَ اللَّهَ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَمَا يَخْدَعُونَ إِلَّا أَنفُسَهُمْ
ayahs.translation: They [think to] deceive Allah and those who believe, but they deceive not except themselves.

ayahs.text: إِذَا جَاءَكَ الْمُنَافِقُونَ قَالُوا نَشْهَدُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسُولُ اللَّهِ
ayahs.translation: When the hypocrites come to you, they say, 'We testify that you are the Messenger of Allah.'

ayahs.text: إِنَّ الْمُنَافِقِينَ فِي الدَّرْكِ الْأَسْفَلِ مِنَ النَّارِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the hypocrites will be in the lowest depths of the Fire.

topics.name: Jihad & Righteous Struggle
topics.description: Verses about striving in the path of Allah and righteous struggle.

ayahs.text: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
ayahs.translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways.

ayahs.text: فَلَا تُطِعِ الْكَافِرِينَ وَجَاهِدْهُم بِهِ جِهَادًا كَبِيرًا
ayahs.translation: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with the Qur'an a great striving.

ayahs.text: وَجَاهِدُوا فِي اللَّهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهِ
ayahs.translation: And strive for Allah with the striving due to Him.

ayahs.text: الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَهَاجَرُوا وَجَاهَدُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ بِأَمْوَالِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ
ayahs.translation: The ones who have believed, emigrated and striven in the cause of Allah with their wealth and their lives.

topics.name: Children & Orphans
topics.description: Verses about the treatment and care of children and orphans.

ayahs.text: وَآتُوا الْيَتَامَىٰ أَمْوَالَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تَتَبَدَّلُوا الْخَبِيثَ بِالطَّيِّبِ
ayahs.translation: And give to the orphans their properties and do not substitute the defective [of your own] for the good [of theirs].

ayahs.text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَأْكُلُونَ أَمْوَالَ الْيَتَامَىٰ ظُلْمًا إِنَّمَا يَأْكُلُونَ فِي بُطُونِهِمْ نَارًا
ayahs.translation: Indeed, those who devour the property of orphans unjustly are only consuming into their bellies fire.

ayahs.text: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
ayahs.translation: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].

ayahs.text: وَلَا تَقْتُلُوا أَوْلَادَكُمْ خَشْيَةَ إِمْلَاقٍ
ayahs.translation: And do not kill your children for fear of poverty.

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
ayahs.translation: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked.

topics.name: Food & Sustenance (Rizq)
topics.description: Verses about food, sustenance, and Allah's provision.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ كُلُوا مِمَّا فِي الْأَرْضِ حَلَالًا طَيِّبًا
ayahs.translation: O mankind, eat from whatever is on earth [that is] lawful and good.

ayahs.text: وَكُلُوا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ حَلَالًا طَيِّبًا
ayahs.translation: And eat of what Allah has provided for you [which is] lawful and good.

ayahs.text: وَمَا مِن دَابَّةٍ فِي الْأَرْضِ إِلَّا عَلَى اللَّهِ رِزْقُهَا
ayahs.translation: And there is no creature on earth but that upon Allah is its provision.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.

ayahs.text: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَامْشُوا فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا مِن رِّزْقِهِ
ayahs.translation: It is He who made the earth subservient to you, so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision.

topics.name: Peace & War
topics.description: Verses about peace, conflict, and just warfare.

ayahs.text: وَإِن جَنَحُوا لِلسَّلْمِ فَاجْنَحْ لَهَا
ayahs.translation: And if they incline to peace, then incline to it [also].

ayahs.text: وَقَاتِلُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ الَّذِينَ يُقَاتِلُونَكُمْ وَلَا تَعْتَدُوا
ayahs.translation: Fight in the way of Allah those who fight you but do not transgress.

ayahs.text: وَإِن طَائِفَتَانِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ اقْتَتَلُوا فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا
ayahs.translation: And if two factions among the believers should fight, then make settlement between the two.

topics.name: Commerce & Trade
topics.description: Verses about business, trade, and economic ethics.

ayahs.text: وَأَحَلَّ اللَّهُ الْبَيْعَ وَحَرَّمَ الرِّبَا
ayahs.translation: But Allah has permitted trade and forbidden usury.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَأْكُلُوا أَمْوَالَكُم بَيْنَكُم بِالْبَاطِلِ إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً عَن تَرَاضٍ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, do not consume one another's wealth unjustly but only [in lawful] business by mutual consent.

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
ayahs.translation: Woe to those who give less [than due].

ayahs.text: وَأَوْفُوا الْكَيْلَ وَالْمِيزَانَ بِالْقِسْطِ
ayahs.translation: And give full measure and weight in justice.

topics.name: Modesty & Clothing
topics.description: Verses about modest dress and behavior.

ayahs.text: قُل لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَغُضُّوا مِنْ أَبْصَارِهِمْ وَيَحْفَظُوا فُرُوجَهُمْ
ayahs.translation: Tell the believing men to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts.

ayahs.text: وَقُل لِّلْمُؤْمِنَاتِ يَغْضُضْنَ مِنْ أَبْصَارِهِنَّ وَيَحْفَظْنَ فُرُوجَهُنَّ
ayahs.translation: And tell the believing women to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ قُل لِّأَزْوَاجِكَ وَبَنَاتِكَ وَنِسَاءِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ يُدْنِينَ عَلَيْهِنَّ مِن جَلَابِيبِهِنَّ
ayahs.translation: O Prophet, tell your wives and your daughters and the women of the believers to bring down over themselves [part] of their outer garments.

topics.name: Environment & Natural World
topics.description: Verses about the natural world and environmental stewardship.

ayahs.text: هُوَ الَّذِي أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً لَّكُم مِّنْهُ شَرَابٌ وَمِنْهُ شَجَرٌ
ayahs.translation: It is He who sends down rain from the sky; from it is drink and from it is foliage.

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ الْفُلْكَ تَجْرِي فِي الْبَحْرِ بِنِعْمَتِ اللَّهِ
ayahs.translation: Do you not see that ships sail through the sea by the favor of Allah.

ayahs.text: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً مُّبَارَكًا فَأَنبَتْنَا بِهِ جَنَّاتٍ وَحَبَّ الْحَصِيدِ
ayahs.translation: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest.

ayahs.text: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَامْشُوا فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا
ayahs.translation: It is He who made the earth subservient to you, so walk among its slopes.
